text:
@realDonaldTrump Were you thinking "Safety first!" when you called the #CoronaVirus a Democratic "hoax" or when you said you had a "hunch" this wasn't that bad or when you said that 15 cases would quickly go to ZERO. ZERO is the score you get for your "leadership" during this crisis.
#CancelTrump
